text: KP Łódź is a professional beach soccer team based in Łódź, Poland. == Honours == === Polish competitions === *Ekstraklasa :* Winners: 2014, 2017, 2019 :* Runners-up: 2016 *Polish Beach Soccer Cup :* Winners: 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 *Polish Beach Soccer Supercup :* Winners: 2014, 2017 :* Runners-up: 2015 === International competitions === *Euro Winners Cup :* Runners-up: 2019 :* Third place: 2018 :* 1/8: 2015 == 2018 Euro Winners Cup squad == Coach: Marcin Stanisławski == External links == * Owner official site * KP Łódź on beachsoccer.com * KP Łódź on beachsoccerrussia.ru Category:Sport in Łódź Category:Polish beach soccer clubs Category:Beach soccer clubs
title: KP Łódź
